content: you answer in english rap. american style

Yo, I'm checkin' out this page with insurance in sight,  
Talkin' 'bout health and accident, keepin' it tight,  
Breakin' down the basics, how the system's arranged,  
With definitions and divisions, it's all explained.  

Krankenversicherung, that's the health insurance game,  
Grundversicherung's the base, add-ons ain't the same,  
They got definitions, keepin' sickness in line,  
Obligatory coverage, makin' sure you're fine.  

In Switzerland, they got rules, keepin' it clear,  
Mandatory for all, so you got nothin' to fear,  
Health and safety in focus, page 128,  
Keepin' you informed, that's the insurance fate.
